review: Amazon  Fire  enables me to stream from  my tablet,  or cell. However,  I  cannot  seem to stream  from  my other  television.  I am  disappointed about  this. I tried trouble shooting, and have  had no success.Rating of 3 stars because :I would give Amazon Fire 4 or 5 stars however, since I cannot  use it on my other television.I am also  disappointed that I  am charged to use certain  apps. I am unsure why these apps  are offered only to those who subscribe  to them.I  understand that  Roku allows access to these same apps. Perhaps Roku will connect to  my other  television,  and allow me to use the other applications.
author: Cheryl Ellison

review: Love my Fire TV, very fast very capable 1080p streaming from Internet sources on WIFI, also very capable of full 1080p streaming from local sources over 10/100 Ethernet!
author: Bob E

review: Great remedy for the boring traditional television. It brings to life all of those apps on your pad to the big screen, and allows numerous opportunity for entertainment and education. Whether it's music for the house party, games for the kids, news for the news junky, or education in the form of video, this device is the simple answer. Easy hook up, and user friendly application. Great purchase.
